title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.32 - Mandatory information card
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.32 - Mandatory information card

State Regulations

Each jockey, apprentice jockey and exercise rider shall
carry on his or her person a card or other device containing his or her name; emergency contact information; HIS account name and password and website
address; and medical insurance provider. Such card or other device shall be
carried in a manner making the information readily accessible by emergency and
medical professionals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.32

Adopted

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/16/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
